    "number": 190805,
    "data": "1,4,7,13,22,25,40,43,49,67,76,79,85,97,121,130,133,148,151,157,169,193,202,229,238,241,256,259,265,292,295,301,313,337,364,385,391,400,403,445,454,457,472,475,481,508,511,517,529,580,583,589,601,607,625,673,688,715,724,727",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 2x-1 and 3x+1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A190803."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A190805/b190805.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 2; i = -1; j = 3; k = 1; f = 1; g = 10 ;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]  (* A190805 *)",
        "b = (a + 1)/2; c = (a - 1)/3; r = Range[1, 500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A190845 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A190808 conjectured *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a190805 n = a190805_list !! (n-1)",
        "a190805_list = 1 : f (singleton 4)",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (2*m-1) $ insert (3*m+1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A190803, A190845."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 20 2011",
    "ext": [
        "a(56)=673 inserted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
